title: Little Happier: The Musical “Song of Spider-Man” and the Problem of the Unknown Knowns
description:
A memoir about the failure of the musical “Song of Spider-Man” is a sobering example of how sometimes, we choose not to know the things we know—with very bad consequences.
Get tickets for our live podcast events in Seattle, Portland, San Fransisco, Chicago, Kansas City,  Providence, Philadelphia, Washington D.C., Atlanta and Charlotte here: https://gretchenrubin.com/events
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
